Title: Magica's Content Pack
Description:
[h1]Check out the mod's [url=https://discord.gg/JWKVr79VXu] discord server [/url] to submit direct feedback and check to see what's upcoming![/h1]

This mod pertains to my personal reinterpretation of Downpour, including base game slugcats. At the moment there are little major gameplay changes, but there is a lot of new art to rediscover!

[h1] Content in this mod includes: [/h1]
[list][*] New DMS skins (+ a template)
[*] New cutscenes / menu art
[*] Options to enable / disable certain aspects of the mod
[*] Revamped story points[/list]

[h2] Acknowledgements for patch 1.1.0: [/h2]
[list][*] Arti's custom scar sprites cannot be interchanged like the normal scar, instead it is separated into it's own category for future support.
[*] Spearmaster's graphics are not fully completed, some physics scenarios may not be accounted for and may change in the future.
[*] Half of the art was made half a year ago, and may not reflect the quality standard I now have in mind, but the general emotional tone remains the same.
[*] I did all of this by myself, with outside advice only for figuring out how to code in the first place.[/list]
RequirementNames: Dress My Slugcat,More Slugcats Expansion,Custom Region Support,SlugBase
